a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ARAD-ka {1}{d}PA-EN-GIN lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ DI-mu a-na KUR ša LUGAL EN-ia₂ ṭe₃-e-mu ša {1}x x x x ma-a {1}EN-šu₂-nu {1}x+x x x {1}x x x-ri ARAD-MEŠ x x x x ina UGU-hi-šu₂ ik-ta-ru x x x-ki-šu₂ i-tu-ur-du o ih-tu-ru-up i-si-šu₂-nu x x x+x ki-i e-ma-ru-u-ni x x x+x iš-ši-mu-u-ni ma-a i-ba-aš₂-ši it-ta-ab-bu i-su-uh-ru a-na {LU₂}pu-qu-di
